backend/main.mo: Motoko canister that generates mock trip itineraries by building day plans, food spots, and transport details, returning a formatted itinerary string.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of key frontend files and components in the Goa Planner app.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based stylesheet defining theme variables and color tokens for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML template that loads the React application via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React entry component that renders the LandingPage.
frontend/src/components/GoaPlanner/Itine: Parses itinerary text into sections and renders days, food spots, transport card, and WhatsApp CTA with loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/GoaPlanner/Landi: Top-level planner page handling form state, mock mode toggle, and selecting mock or real trip-planning mutations.
frontend/src/components/GoaPlanner/TripP: UI form for selecting trip duration, budget, travel type, and location before submitting a trip-planning request.
frontend/src/constants/whatsapp.ts: Exports the fixed WhatsApp contact URL used by the CTA button.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Initializes and caches a backend actor based on the current Internet Identity, recreating it on identity change and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, logout, identity loading, and status tracking via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useMockPlanTrip.ts: Defines a mock mutation that waits briefly and returns a hardcoded sample itinerary without calling the backend.
frontend/src/hooks/usePlanTrip.ts: Calls the backend actor’s planTrip method, mapping UI form data to backend format and returning the generated itinerary.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind base styles and custom Goa-themed color variables for light and dark modes with utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app by mounting React, providing QueryClient and Internet Identity context, and loading global styles.
frontend/src/mock/sampleItinerary.ts: Exports a multiline hardcoded sample 3‑day Goa itinerary used for mock mode or fallback.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, container settings, animations, and theme extensions for the Goa UI.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, goals, issues, and requirements for building a responsive Goa trip planner with mock fallback mode.
